appreciate_text: If you think this project is helpful to you, you can buy me a cup of coffee, thank you!

sentence.leaderboard_rule1: The rule for calculating speed is 'Total characters / Total time (seconds) * 60', which represents the number of characters typed per minute, including punctuation but excluding spaces.
sentence.leaderboard_rule2: The ranking only retains the fastest record.
sentence.leaderboard_rule3: The leaderboard only retains the fastest record under the same user or IP.
sentence.game_rule1: Here, you can create a competition and invite friends to join. The game is based on the countdown method of 'Limit' mode.
sentence.game_rule2: If you encounter any issues, please feel free to click the button in the bottom right corner to provide feedback.
sentence.word_tip: During typing, pressing the Esc key in the top left corner of the keyboard can end input progress at any time.
sentence.reminder1: Input records will be saved locally, and when attempting the same copy again, it will be compared with the last attempt.
sentence.reminder2: "Review Playback" allows you to replay the entire process and also offers fast-forward playback.
sentence.reminder3: To avoid meaningless data, "Save Records" need to meet a duration greater than 15 seconds and an accuracy rate greater than 80%.
